verses.name: Jeremiah 36:10
verses.text: Then read Baruch in the book the words of Jeremiah in the house of the Lord, in the chamber of Gemariah the son of Shaphan the scribe, in the higher court, at the entry of the new gate of the Lord’s house, in the ears of all the people.

verses.name: Jeremiah 36:11
verses.text: When Michaiah the son of Gemariah, the son of Shaphan, had heard out of the book all the words of the Lord,
